articles.title: Overall drop of "operation plan 5027" called for
S. Korean chief executive anxious to invite Japanese "Emperor"
articles.content:
Overall drop of "operation plan 5027" called for
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The south, north and overseas headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) held a meeting on February 12 to vow to struggle against the U.S. war moves on the Korean peninsula, to get nuclear weapons and the U.S. troops withdrawn from South Korea and to build a reunified country by confederacy formula and issued a joint statement saying that no one in the world can block a patriotic struggle for the country's reunification.   The statement recalled that the U.S., Japan and the anti-reunification "government" of South Korea are resorting to reckless war moves against the DPRK, clamoring about "suspected underground nuclear facility" and "missile threat."   It went on:   The U.S. should completely withdraw the "operation plan 5027" of aggression and sincerely implement the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework as it is committed to the north.   A peace agreement between the DPRK and the U.S. should be signed as soon as possible and the U.S. troops and nuclear weapons in South Korea,  sources of war, should be withdrawn at an early date, for a lasting stability and peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK war confab between Japan and S. Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean chief executive anxious to invite Japanese "Emperor"
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The present South Korean chief executive in an interview with the head of Tokyo Shimbun said on Wednesday it was "undesirable" to postpone Japanese "Emperor's" visit to Seoul beyond the year 2002, feeling very anxious to invite the Japanese "ghost" to South Korea at an early date, according to a report of Tokyo Shimbun.   The Japanese side thinks "there still remains an obstacle" in the way of the "Emperor's" visit to South Korea in view of strong anti-Japanese feelings of South Koreans, but the South Korean chief executive insisted "there was no big obstacle," the paper said.   Kim Dae Jung is such a man who can not even guess people's anti-Japanese feelings. No sooner had he come to power than he invited the Japanese "Emperor" to visit South Korea as his first "protocol work."  During his visit to Japan last October he reinvited the Japanese "Emperor" to visit South Korea. He renewed this invitation while meeting the head of the newspaper.   He will certainly face denunciation from the entire nation if he brings the Japanese "Emperor" to South Korea, which the successive authority rulers did not dare to do.

articles.title: Joint plenary meeting of religious organizations
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK war confab between Japan and S. Korea
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- An anti-DPRK war confab was held between high-ranking staffers of the Japanese maritime "self-defense force" and the South Korean navy over February 9-10 at a staff office of the Japan maritime  "SDF,"  according to a report of the Japan Defense Agency's organ "Asagumo."   At the confab they informed other side of their war preparations of aggression against the DPRK and discussed an impending joint military exercise program.  This came as a follow up of a plan to materialize an anti-north war scenario which was worked out at secret talks between the director of the Japan Defense Agency and the "Minister of the National Defense" of South Korea in Seoul last January.

articles.title: Stop to "cooperation" with outsiders and joint military maneuvers called for
articles.content:
Joint plenary meeting of religious organizations
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- A joint plenary meeting of the central committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party and the central guidance committee of the Korean Chondoist Association was held here on Saturday.   The meeting discussed tasks to implement a proposal of a joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK to open a new phase of national reunification through national independence and great unity.    At the meeting chairperson Ryu Mi Yong of the central committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party made a report, followed by speeches.    The reporter and speakers fully supported the proposal and called for making great efforts for its realization.   They called upon national religious organizations, including Chondoism and non-governmental organizations in South Korea to rise up in an active struggle for the realization of the proposal.

articles.title: Russian President congratulates Kim Jong Il on his birthday
articles.content:
Stop to "cooperation" with outsiders and joint military maneuvers called for
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Il Hwan, first secretary of the c.c., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made public a statement on Saturday in support of a proposal adopted at a joint meeting of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.   He said:   The South Korean authorities should stop "cooperation" and joint military maneuvers with outsiders.    That is a prerequisite for genuine reconciliation and unity between the north and South of Korea and dialogue for reunification.   They should reject outside forces, adopt  the stand of national independence and immediately take practical measures for sincere implementation of priorities proposed at the joint meeting for opening a phase of reunification through detente and reconciliation this year.   All youths and students of the DPRK should make great efforts to realize the proposal together with youths and students in South Korea and abroad.

articles.title: Fireworks displayed above Jong Il Peak
articles.content:
Russian President congratulates Kim Jong Il on his birthday 
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings from B. Yeltsin, President of the Russian federation, on February 12.   The President in the message sincerely congratulated Kim Jong Il on February 16, a significant day  and the national holiday of the DPRK.   The message said:   I am convinced that developing Russia-DPRK relationship in the spirit of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation conforms with the interests of the peoples of the two countries, and it will help consolidate peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and north-east Asia.   I wish you good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory literature appears in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fireworks displayed above Jong Il Peak
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed above Jong Il Peak in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu on Saturday to celebrate the auspicious holiday of February. 
   Gathering there to see the display were director of the General Political Department Jo Myong Rok, chief of the general staff Kim Yong Chun, KPA marshal Ri Ul Sol, and other general-level officers, commanders of all arms and services and officers and men of the three services of the Korean People's Army and senior officials of local party and government bodies and public organizations as well as  working people and visitors.   
   Floral baskets and bouquets were laid in front of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's native home in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu before beautiful fireworks were set off.
   Soldiers of the three services of the KPA met in front of the native home to vow their loyalty to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.    Jo Myong Rok in his report said that the birth of the supreme commander was a great event whereby the Korean nation could acclaim another outstanding leader who would lead Korea, the land of Juche, and a historic occasion that opened a bright future for the cause of global independence.    Led by delegates of the three services, the participants solemnly resolved to prepare themselves to be death-defying corps, heroes of Ri Su Bok type and suicidal soldiers of Kil Yong Jo type and thus defend the Supreme Commander with their lives.

articles.title: Korean peninsula-targeted U.S. Marine Corps based in Japan
articles.content:
Congratulatory literature appears in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Over 20 copies of literature celebrating the 57th birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il appeared in a street in front of a department store  in Koyang,  Kyonggi Province of South Korea on Friday, according to a radio report from Seoul.   Printed in the literature were a picture of Kim Jong Il, a photo of his native home in the Mt. Paektu secret camp and letters celebrating his birthday.

articles.title: Oratorical meeting held to celebrate February 16
articles.content:
Korean peninsula-targeted U.S. Marine Corps based in Japan
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- The commander of the U.S. Marine Corps in Japan headquartered  in Okinawa Prefecture, Japan, reportedly had an exclusive interview with the Yomiuri Shimbun  on Feb. 11, in which he said the U.S. Marine Corps in Japan is "on the alert to immediately react to missile launch" in North Korea.   He admitted Japan-based U.S. Marine Corps has intensified war exercises in the wake of an artificial satellite launch in the DPRK last year, saying the situation on the Korean peninsula was "very opaque" and there was a "grave threat from North Korea."   He added that the U.S. Marine Corps in Japan would give direct support to the U.S. forces in South Korea and the South Korean army in "an emergency" on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Guidelines for building KPA into ideologically powerful army
articles.content:
Oratorical meeting held to celebrate February 16
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- An oratorical meeting celebrating February 16 was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday.   Present on the occasion were senior party and state officials Pak Song Chol, Paek Hak Rim, Yang Hyong Sop and Choe Thae Bok and officials of the commission and ministries under the cabinet and national institutions.   The meeting heard speeches titled "Mainstay for building a powerful nation," "Leader Kim Jong Il Is the greatest Marshal" and "Let us live for the future."   The speakers highly praised the greatness of Kim Jong Il and said with great pride that, under him, the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation, the sun's nation, are being demonstrated all over the world.   They called for advancing merrily toward the future, making their life worthy,  though their way is rugged.   After the meeting, an art performance was given by officials of the national institutions.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on anti-DPRK rackets in Japan
articles.content:
Guidelines for building KPA into ideologically powerful army
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- "On Improving and Strengthening Propaganda and Agitation Work Within the People's Army," a work published by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Feb. 14, Juche 68 (1979) is of great theoretical and practical importance in building the People's Army into a powerful army  which is fully prepared politically and ideologically and which has strong faith. 
   Colonel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Ryol stresses this in an article contributed to Rodong Sinmun today on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the publication of the work.   
   The author further says:   The work deals with all issues related to displaying politico-ideological superiority of the KPA such as strengthening education in loyalty to the leader and education in party policy, revolutionary tradition and socialist patriotism and  bringing the unity between the army and people and between officers and men into full play. 
   The ideas, theories and policies set out in the work have proved their great vitality, justness and attraction in practice.
   The whole army, replete with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, has been fully prepared to be a death defying corps determined to resolutely fight in defence of the leader and has been strengthened and developed into a revolutionary army which firmly defends the working-class principles and the interest of the revolution.   
   The KPA has grown to be ranks of human bombs to defend the headquarters of the revolution with their lives.
   All the servicemen from veteran fighters to young soldiers are firmly resolved to become human bombs in safeguarding the Supreme Commander.
   The KPA units have persistently  and positively carried out revolutionary and class education, with result that all the soldiers have become tiger-like ones who will fight the imperialists to the end.   
   The KPA has conducted ideological education in a revolutionary way as anti-Japanese did.
   The KPA officers and men will invariably take the ideas and theories of Kim Jong Il as their guidelines and reliably defend the revolutionary cause of Juche.
